entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Ottawa (Kanata - Orléans)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 8:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: W 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times heavy beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets late in the evening then to rain showers near midnight. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
